trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCDAILYLOTDESCRIPTION_00226_TALK_01<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, fair traveler! I am the purveyor of Mini Cactpot tickets. Why not buy one to find out why we say “prosperity's but a scratch away”?
TEXT_CMNGSCDAILYLOTDESCRIPTION_00226_TALK_02<tab>You can purchase up to three Mini Cactpot tickets per day.

TEXT_CMNGSCDAILYLOTDESCRIPTION_00226_TALK_03<tab>The counter for Mini Cactpot tickets resets daily at <var 06 01 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
